DOC.brief_summary: The steep trendelenburg position pneumoperitoneum laparoscopic surgery potential cause adverse effect respiratory mechanic gas exchange . Previous study propose prolonged I : E ratio ventilation improve respiratory mechanic gas exchange . Therefore , aim study evaluate whether prolonged I : E ratio ventilation improve gas exchange respiratory mechanic patient undergo robot-assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Different Inspiratory Expiratory Ratios Respiratory Mechanics Oxygenation Robot-assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy With Steep Trendelenburg Position Pneumoperitoneum
DOC.criteria: Adult male patient ( 2090 year age ) schedule elective robotassisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy undergo general anesthesia Patients abnormal airway anatomy , reactive airway disease , chronic respiratory disease , history coronary artery disease , heart failure BMI > 30 kg/m 2
